title: Silver is worse than Bronze i swear.

replies.body:
The reason that
 silver is "worse than bronze" is that people in silver think they have escaped "Elo Hell" and that they were obviously skilled enough to get out of it, so they decide it is better that they not take advice and listen to themselves to progress further. Lots of people in Bronze have started realizing that the best way to get out of bronze is to **listen**. People in silver however mostly refuse to communicate, as they think they are better than everyone just for being in silver. This is Ironic however as I am also in silver. And I am the best.

^

tl;dr Silvers think they're on a higher level than bronze.

Carry them with your skill?
Add me if u want to get better
Well what will your tips be to get higher in silver people say Amumu is freelo

People make mistakes at every level. People aren't always going to listen to or agree with your calls. You're going to get people flaming or feeding. Get used to it, otherwise you'll still be making threads like this after you get to gold or plat or diamond.

I was "stuck" in Silver 3 until I decided to duo with a friend.

Went from Silver 3 to Plat 5 in roughly 100 games.

Reduced the "unknown idiot" factor by 1 and it really helps
